name: G-Live CMS
author: wiclax.com

sections.description:
Content Management System for your Wiclax results hosting.
Helper for G-Live configuration and linking race data to your WordPress posts.

The plugin will interact with Wiclax software and your Wiclax online user account.
When working on a Wiclax event file, you’ll be able to select its corresponding post on your WordPress.
sections.changelog:
0.3

  • Initial Revision

0.4

  • Fixed an issue with the G-Live files update

0.7

  • Fixed issues with some particular server configurations

0.8

  • New ability to edit custom header file
